raw_body: Beloved husband of the late Chinthamani Neeliya, loving father of Mandika and Chandrika, Varuna and Siruni, Sharmalee and Harsha, loving grandfather of Lihini and Sanuja, Manuk and Indira, Vishan and Shavin, Anushke and Sonia, Nathasha and Nipuna, great grandfather of Karina and Mars. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Wednesday 20th March 2024 from 8.00 a.m. onwards, cortege leaves parlour on the same day, at 3.30 p.m. for crema
